dt: {bc}a season or festival of merrymaking before Lent
{bc}an instance of merrymaking, feasting, or masquerading
{bc}an organized program of entertainment or exhibition {bc}{sx|festival||}

et: Italian {it}carnevale{/it}, alteration of earlier {it}carnelevare{/it}, literally, removal of meat, from {it}carne{/it} flesh (from Latin {it}carn-, caro{/it}) + {it}levare{/it} to remove, from Latin, to raise
shortdef: a season or festival of merrymaking before Lent
an instance of merrymaking, feasting, or masquerading

dt: {bc}suggestive of or suited to a carnival

shortdef: suggestive of or suited to a carnival
